properties.title: The Thinking Machine (Artificial Intelligence in the 1960s)

properties.content: thinking machines or robots could transcend humanity with cognitive awareness
thinking machines or robots could discern and learn tasks without human intervention
thinking machines or robots could replace workers in droves
thinking machines or robots could potentially serve as robots for spouses
